meanings.sent1: Her mistyping of the email address caused the message to be undelivered.
meanings.sent2: I always make a mistyping when I rush to finish my assignments.
meanings.sent3: The mistyping of the password led to a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: His mistyping of the code was like playing a wrong note in a musical composition.
meanings.sent5: The constant mistyping of words made her feel frustrated with her typing skills.

meanings.sent1: The mistyping in the document changed the entire meaning of the sentence.
meanings.sent2: I often catch my mistyping errors when I proofread my work.
meanings.sent3: His mistyping of the word 'banana' as 'bandana' made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The mistyping in the report was like a small hiccup in an otherwise smooth process.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of avoiding mistyping in our essays.
